title: Ticket #5068: Multiple keys for the remote_gahp
description:
Currently, we can only use a single SSH pubkey with remote_gahp. This is a fairly annoying limitation.

Here's a proposal to allow multiple keys:

  1. For remote_gahp, change the default hashing function so a unique remote_gahp is started per-user per-key (where the pubkey is specified as a job attribute).
  2. When the remote_gahp is started, it will preferentially use the pubkey specified in the job attribute (defaulting to the current one).

This should preserve backward compatibility while allowing a per-job key to be specified.

Thoughts?
